item.title: How to promote your Live stream
item.description:
How to promote your Live stream

The Basics

Planning is needed for a successful live stream. This includes giving yourself time to prepare and amble room for error. As a starting point, make sure you have at least 48 hours from when you schedule the event from its launch. The more time the better.

item.title: Five things that make a marketing video effective. - OMM
item.description:
Five things that make a marketing video effective. - OMM

This video is very effective. It's fun, it's memorable, it's evocative and it's something that you want to share. It informs you, it engages you, it moves you and it's very well done. Wow. Sponsored by RIOTUR, the City of Rio de Janeiro's tourism authority, this video was created to support RIO's bid to host the 2016 Summer Olympics.

item.title: Webinars
item.description:
Webinars

Webinar is short for Web-based Seminar, a presentation, lecture, workshop or seminar that is transmitted over the Web. It is typically one-way form of communication from the speaker to the audience with a bit of audience interaction, primarily through chat.

item.title: Our hosting platform
item.description:
Our hosting platform

Using a combination of the JJTS servers for the smaller events or one of our partners for the larger scale events, you're guaranteed a streamline solution no matter how many people you have watching your presentation.

item.title: How can JJTS help you?
item.description:
How can JJTS help you?

The next generation of your market are growing up using streaming apps like Meerkat and Periscope, not only that but more and more businesses are catching on to the power of live video.
